xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.17 Sauttaraduka
13.17.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Piṭṭhiduka
Sauttaraduka
Paṭiccādivāra
345.
4791Sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  sauttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (Yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā. Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
4792Sauttaradukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
